snippet: Collins had been filled with fear at the prospect of openly acknowledging he is gay, but the response to his announcement has been overwhelmingly positive.
abstract: Jason Collins, the first openly gay male athlete still active in a major American team sport, says that he had planned to come out publicly, but had been filled with fear at the prospect, worried about negative reaction and the scrutiny that would come from being in the spotlight; response to his announcement, however, has been overwhelmingly positive, including a personal phone call from Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: Collins had been filled with fear at the prospect of openly acknowledging he is gay, but the response to his announcement has been overwhelmingly positive.

headline.seo: Jason Collins Took Personal Steps Before Coming Out Publicly’
headline.main: Jason Collins Took Personal Steps Before Coming Out Publicly
headline.print_headline: Collins Took a Series of Personal Steps Before Coming Out Publicly
